name: Mahjong Cook
description:
Challenge awaits you in this unique mah-jong game
Find, match & remove all tiles through several fun & fast levels.

Mahjong cook is a free solitaire game, with kitchen accessories & culinary specialities from around the world as its theme.

● Fun & casual
This free and addicting game is perfect for players of all skills level !
Rules are simple and each board is always solvable.

● You are never blocked !
Thanks to the system of hints and well constructed levels, you always have a solution, you are never frustrated by a dead end. Remember, if you need a hand, just tap on the hint button!

● Relaxing & satisfying
This premium quality game is your perfect match for a relaxing experience. Be satisfy by clearing all boards.

● Play for hours or only few minutes
Sit back & relax, whether you have only few minutes to spend or many hours, there is always something for you to do.

● Puzzle lovers
If you love puzzle, memory, word search or strategy games, you will love this one !

● Improve your score, and unlock new levels

● Play offline anytime

Mahjong classic solitaire, or majong, or majhong, is one of the most popular board games in the world !
